Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Earned first career win on 6/21/1990...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/17/1990, off Kevin Gross (PHI)...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/16/1990, off Kevin J. Brown (ATL)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/1991, off Roger Clemens (LAD)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 6/24/1991 (Going to PIT: P Clay Parker. Going to SEA: P Scott Bailes, P Barry Jones, P Shawn Holman, P Scott Radinsky, CF Chad Curtis)...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
